hadiths.text: Asim narrated from Zirr, from 'Abdullah, from the Prophet(s.a.w) who said:"A man is coming from the people of my family whose name agrees with my name." 'Asim said: "Abu Salih narrated to us from Abu Hurairah, who said: 'If there did not remain in the world but one day, then Allah would extend that day until he comes
